thread.title: Israeli Police Kill Palestinian Man For Allegedly Attempting to Stab an Officer - WSJ
thread.title_full: Israeli Police Kill Palestinian Man For Allegedly Attempting to Stab an Officer - WSJ

author: Tamer El-Ghobashy
title: Israeli Police Kill Palestinian Man For Allegedly Attempting to Stab an Officer - WSJ
text:
JERUSALEM—Israeli police shot and killed a Palestinian man who allegedly attempted to stab an officer in Jerusalem’s Old City on Monday, the latest such incident that has raised international concern over a widening armed conflict.
The unidentified Palestinian assailant had been walking with his hands in his pockets near the Lion’s Gate of walled Old City, Israeli police said, when he was ordered by police officers to stop for a... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
